summary.span: 提供来自统一资源标识符 (URI) 的响应。

span.span: Provides a response from a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

summary.span: 这是一个 类。

span.span: This is an class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是特定于协议的响应类派生自的基类。`abstract` The class is the `abstract` base class from which protocol-specific response classes are derived. 应用程序可以使用类的实例以协议不可知的方式参与请求和响应事务, 而从派生的协议特定的类可执行请求的详细信息。Applications can participate in request and response transactions in a protocol-agnostic manner using instances of the class while protocol-specific classes derived from carry out the details of the request. 客户端应用程序不直接创建对象, 而是通过对实例调用方法来创建。Client applications do not create objects directly; they are created by calling the method on a instance. ## Examples 下面的示例从创建实例。The following example creates a instance from a . [!code-cpp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebRequest Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic WebRequest Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当由子类重写时，将关闭响应流。

span.span: When overridden by a descendant class, closes the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法清除使用的资源, 并通过调用方法关闭基础流。 The method cleans up the resources used by a and closes the underlying stream by calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 必须关闭响应以避免系统资源不足。The response must be closed to avoid running out of system resources. 可以通过调用或关闭响应流。The response stream can be closed by calling or . > [!NOTE] > 类是一个`abstract`类。 The class is an `abstract` class. 实例在运行时的实际行为由返回的子代类确定。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 有关默认值和异常的详细信息, 请参阅子代类的文档, 例如和。 For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法`WebResponse`关闭。The following example uses the method to close the `WebResponse`. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CPP/webresponse_close.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/CS/webresponse_close.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_Close/VB/webresponse_close.vb#1)]

summary.span: 当在子类中重写时，获取或设置接收的数据的内容长度。

span.span: When overridden in a descendant class, gets or sets the content length of data being received.

value.span: 从 Internet 资源返回的字节数。

span.span: The number of bytes returned from the Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含来自 Internet 资源的响应的长度 (以字节为单位)。The property contains the length, in bytes, of the response from the Internet resource. 对于包含标头信息的请求方法, 不包含标头信息的长度。For request methods that contain header information, the does not include the length of the header information. > [!NOTE] > 类是一个`abstract`类。 The class is an `abstract` class. 实例在运行时的实际行为由返回的子代类确定。The actual behavior of instances at run time is determined by the descendant class returned by . 有关默认值和异常的详细信息, 请参阅子代类的文档, 例如和。 For more information about default values and exceptions, please see the documentation for the descendant classes, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用属性获取返回的资源的长度。The following example uses the property to obtain the Length of the resource returned. [!code-cpp[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/CPP/webresponse_contentlength_type.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/CS/webresponse_contentlength_type.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebResponse_ContentLength_Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WebResponse_ContentLength_Type/VB/webresponse_contentlength_type.vb#1)]

param.span: 如果释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the object, and optionally disposes of the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`的方法, `disposing`并将参数`true`设置为。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 在`Dispose` 设置`disposing` 为`false`的情况调用。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > 当你在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，此成员将输出跟踪信息。This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[.NET Framework 中的网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: 获取一个 值，该值指示此响应是否为从缓存中获取的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether this response was obtained from the cache.

value.span: 如果此响应来自缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the response was taken from the cache; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存中当前缓存策略和请求的资源的状态确定是否可以从缓存中检索响应。The current cache policy and the presence of the requested resource in the cache determine whether a response can be retrieved from the cache. 使用缓存的响应通常会提高应用程序的性能, 但存在缓存中的响应与服务器上的响应不匹配的风险。Using cached responses usually improves application performance, but there is a risk that the response in the cache does not match the response on the server. 使用属性设置和类来枚举当前缓存策略。 Use the property to set and the class to enumerate the current caching policy. 请注意, 获取此属性可能会引发。Note that getting this property can throw .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要请求相互身份验证, 请使用或枚举值设置属性。To request mutual authentication, set the property using the or enumeration value. 属性的默认值包含和。The default value for the property contains and . 请注意, 获取此属性可能会引发。Note that getting this property can throw . ## Examples 下面的代码示例检查此属性的值。The following code example checks the value of this property.
